title: The Future of Resilient Supply Chains
content:
Supply chains are no longer just about cost and efficiency. In the post-pandemic world, companies must design resilient networks that can withstand disruption. This includes building strong supplier relationships, diversifying sourcing, and investing in digital visibility tools.

A McKinsey report found that 93% of supply chain leaders plan to make resilience a top priority. The companies that do this well will gain long-term competitive advantages.

Key practices:
- Map your entire supply chain
- Monitor risk proactively
- Partner for flexibility
- Use AI for real-time decisions
